name: SBElementArray
desc: SBElementArray is subclass of NSMutableArray that manages collections of related SBObject objects. For example, when you ask the Finder for a list of disks, or ask iTunes for a list of playlists, you get the result back as an SBElementArray containing Scripting Bridge objects representing those items.

items.name: func object(withName: String) -> Any
items.desc: Returns the object in the array with the given name.

items.name: func object(withID: Any) -> Any
items.desc: Returns the object in the array with the given identifier.

items.name: func object(atLocation: Any) -> Any
items.desc: Returns the object at the given location in the receiver.

items.name: func get() -> [Any]?
items.desc: Forces evaluation of the receiver, causing the real object to be returned immediately.

items.name: func array(byApplying: Selector) -> [Any]
items.desc: Returns an array containing the results of sending the specified message to each object in the receiver.

items.name: func array(byApplying: Selector, with: Any) -> [Any]
items.desc: Returns an array containing the results of sending the specified message to each object in the receiver.
